subject: Mandatory Security Training
body: All employees must complete new cybersecurity modules before December 10th.

subject: AI Weekly #142
body: This week in AI: breakthroughs in multimodal models and new LLM benchmarks.

subject: Important: Account Login Notice
body: A login attempt was detected from a new device. If this wasn't you, reset your password immediately.

subject: WIN A FREE IPHONE TODAY!
body: Click now to claim your free prize. Limited time offer!!!

subject: Invoice #98765
body: Your subscription invoice for November is attached. Payment due in 7 days.

subject: Code Review Request
body: Can you review my PR before the 4 PM meeting? The changes impact the auth service.

subject: New Issue Assigned to You
body: A new issue regarding API rate limits has been assigned to you.

subject: Scheduled Maintenance Notification
body: Your area will undergo network maintenance on November 28th from 2–4 AM.

subject: Weekend Plans
body: Are you free to visit on Sunday? Let me know early so I can prepare lunch.

subject: Your Order Has Shipped
body: Your recent order is on its way. Track the package from your dashboard.

subject: Sprint Planning Notes
body: Please prepare your task estimates for tomorrow’s sprint planning meeting.

subject: Conference Registration Confirmed
body: You’re registered for Tech Summit 2025. Full schedule available next week.

subject: Re: Mandatory Security Training
body:
Subject: Re: Mandatory Security Training

Dear HR Team,

Thank you for the notification regarding the mandatory cybersecurity modules. I will make sure to complete them by the deadline of December 10th.

Could you please provide more details on the training requirements and any specific procedures I need to follow?

Best regards,
[Your Name]

subject: Re: Security alert
body:
Subject: Re: Security alert

Dear Google Team,

Thank you for reaching out regarding the security alert on my Google Account. I've checked my account activity and taken steps to secure my account.

Before proceeding further, could you please provide me with more context on the 'ocean ai' access mentioned in the email? I would appreciate any additional information you can provide regarding this incident.

Thank you for your time and assistance in keeping my account secure.

Best regards,
Ramana
